channel.title: Someone bring KingPk back
channel.description: This was the best pk server, not once did it ever die due to lack of players. It always died due to admin.

item.title: Someone bring KingPk back
item.dc:creator: @fran_ta_the_brah fran ta the brah
item.description:
@fran_ta_the_brah wrote:

[quote=“Dustin Jr, post:3, topic:518369”][quote author=waj link=topic=636633.msg4292160#msg4292160 date=1367509733]
So the server with only XML edits is the best?

I beg to differ.
[/quote]

idk what that means, but i know it was a fun pk server, and it was always active.[/quote]
yea plz sum1 put it up

Read full topic

item.title: Someone bring KingPk back
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“Dustin Jr, post:3, topic:518369”][quote author=waj link=topic=636633.msg4292160#msg4292160 date=1367509733]
So the server with only XML edits is the best?

I beg to differ.
[/quote]

idk what that means, but i know it was a fun pk server, and it was always active.[/quote]

Just curious… what made it fun? Was complete shit to me… always preferred real pk servers. Where is Zoby when you need him.
